summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6069 for the improvement of 39th Avenue North from East McGraw Street to East Boston Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sanitary and storm sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 83222, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
